thread.title: GOP pulls health care overhaul off House floor in humiliating setback for Donald Trump
thread.title_full: GOP pulls health care overhaul off House floor in humiliating setback for Donald Trump

author: Erica Werner, Alan Fram, The Associated Press
title: GOP pulls health care overhaul off House floor in humiliating setback for Donald Trump
text:
WASHINGTON — Speaker Paul Ryan has abruptly pulled the Republicans’ troubled health care overhaul off the House floor.
The decision was a humiliating setback for President Donald Trump and congressional leaders.
The bill had appeared all but certain to be defeated Friday. The roll call was on track to occur in about an hour.
The measure has been a top GOP priority and was the party’s first major legislative effort since it took control of both the White House and Congress in January.
The legislation would repeal much of former President Barack Obama’s 2010 health care law, including its requirement that people buy policies.
Related Charles Krauthammer: Trump vs. the media. And the courts, and the states, and his party … Trump gambles on health care by forcing vote. But will enough GOP holdouts back him at crunch time?
